name: staff-on-leave

description: See the calander view of employees who are off work today
author: Aditya-Raj-Tiwari

commands.name: off-today
commands.title: off today
commands.subtitle: On leave today
commands.description: See the calander view of employees who are off work today

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
